story.text: [[Steve Jorgensen]] works as an Agile [[Ruby On Rails]] programmer for [[Renewable Funding]] in [[Portland Oregon]], and is also taking on moonlighting clients for Rails and other kinds of Web application development and maintenance.

Steve is currently interested in techniques for achieving long-term, sustainable development in Rails by applying techniques such as Hexagonal Architecture. He is also engaged in exploration of the virtues and vices of various forms of the [[Tell Dont Ask]] principle.

Steve is a frequent contributor of answers on [[Stack Overflow]] and is the author of [[Vb Lite Unit]].  His professional Web site is [http://stevej.name stevej.name], and his technical blog is at [http://techblog.stevej.name techblog.stevej.name].
